title: Pesu at 93.5 percentile? is it possible
content: fine with ece as well , is there any chance of aiml , thanks in advance

comments.body: Bro this is like 100th time ppl are asking this here , bro this is the sub reddit of the university , we seriously have no clue what u might or might not get , sorry if i am rude

yeah bro just now actually a week before the jee results got declared so ig you will be seeing a lot more of them if the mods would put up a rule or something then it would reduce their numbers actually

There is 0 practical knowledge in this field at PES. Theoritical gets frustrating and tought after a point. Also for some reason the ECE dept is very strict in discipline as well as giving away marks. 

So you wont learn much , plus you cant score good grades easily also

I would suggest take a different branch . Also please dont take carrier advices on reddit
